nodes.text: Mirip Pag was a male Iotran gunnery officer who served onboard the pirate Urias Xhaxin's EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Free Lance during the Yuuzhan Vong War.
In 25 ABY, Mirip was onboard the Free Lance when the frigate was under attack by the Yuuzhan Vong. Pag discovered that the fire of the Free Lance was absorbed by the Yuuzhan Vong vessels.
